ExploreFact.Text: This gas giant smells weird, and it turns me on!

RumorFact.Text: Snata is inside Sensual Aroma... hopefully. (hint: north pole)

ExploreFact.Text: Snata has been trapped inside Sensual Aroma for quite a while now. The composition and scent at the core has been driving him mad horny. Unfortunately, he's gone crazy horny, so I'm not gonna save him.
